text: Rep. Dan Crenshaw: "Encourage your Democrat friends to look into it more. Say, 'Hey do you really think that the President actually means this or do you think maybe that's what the media wants you to think that he means? Do you really think that he's this evil person?'" https://t.co/Ce6Vdm2HTY
